title: Create Tool Database Schema and Entity
description:
Set up the database schema and entity for tools with required fields including title, description, image URL, and location information.

Files to modify:
- backend/src/migrations/[timestamp]_create_tools_table.ts (new)
- backend/src/modules/tools/entities/tool.entity.ts (new)
- backend/src/modules/tools/repositories/tool.repository.ts (new)

Changes needed:
1. Create migration for tools table with fields:
   - id (ULID)
   - title (string)
   - description (text)
   - imageUrl (string)
   - ownerId (foreign key to users)
   - latitude (float)
   - longitude (float)
   - createdAt (timestamp)
   - updatedAt (timestamp)
2. Create Tool entity class with proper TypeScript types
3. Create Tool repository with basic CRUD operations

Testing:
- Verify migration runs successfully
- Verify repository can perform basic CRUD operations in e2e test

Acceptance Criteria:
- Supports AC01, AC02, AC03 (database foundation)
